Come on in!

Hello, World!

My name is Jessica Wang, but you can call me Jess.

I was born in Plano, Texas but grew up in Beijing, China. I go to Tufts University in Medford, MA, where I will graduate in 2020. I study Computer Science with a minor in Cognitive and Brain Sciences, and I am currently passionate about full-stack development and information security.
